artist: Utagawa Kunisada Published by Fujiokaya Keijirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: man and woman, with smiling woman in foreground, holding a color printed image of a woman with a child; woman wears kimono that is primarily green with white stylized floral squares; woman turns her face to look at man behind her; man with bare arms behind woman, with grimacing expression, looks at image of woman and child, with his PR hand pushed into his PL sleeve; man wears a black and dark purple plaid kimono with a cloth at the back of his neck which is white with blue dots
marks: Signature and Seal 應需豊國画 {ōju Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: The Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as Igami no Gonta and Bandō Shuka I as his Wife Kosen
